channel.title: Switch on Roy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in Switch on Roy Tang

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
TFW when you’ve left a game in your backlog for so long the remaster is about to come out

Quoted rpgfancom's tweet:
#XenobladeChroniclesDE hits Nintendo #Switch next week! The original #XenobladeChronicles is known for its large and beautiful environments, and the Definitive Edition is looking even better! Which areas are you most looking forward to exploring?

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Street Fighter II was released in 1991. 26 years later, the newest Street Fighter iteration is Ultra Street Fighter II #Switch
